body.name: Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick, Extendable Cell Phone Tripod Stand with Wireless Remote and Phone Holder, Compatible with iPhone Android Phone, Camera (Pink)

features: 【Selfie Stick】 This versatile product combines the functionality of a selfie stick tripod and a mobile phone stand,perfect for selfies, photography, vlogging, live streaming,and family gatherings

【Extendable & Foldable Selfie Stick】 Our telescopic folding selfie stick tripod extends up to 44 inches and folds down to a compact 9.65 inches.It's lightweight and portable,making it convenient for on-the-go use.

【360-degree Rotatable Perfect Angle】 Capture the perfect shot from any angle with our selfie stick tripod.The phone holder allows for 360-degree rotation,while the bracket arm supports over 180 degrees of flexibility.

【Removable Remote Control】 Our selfie stick tripod features a detachable Bluetooth remote control.With a simple push,the remote pops up from the handle,allowing you to control your phone from up to 10 meters (393 inches) away.

【Wide Compatibility】 The adjustable phone bracket accommodates devices between 2.5 and 3.5 inches wide,making it compatible with most smartphones on the market,including iPhone 15/15 Pro/15 Promax/14/14 Pro/14 Promax/13/13 Pro/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max and Galaxy Note 20/S20/S10/S9 running IOS 6.0 and Andoid 4.2.2 or later.
body.description: Selfie Stick Tripod With its foldable tripod legs and extendable shaft, this selfie stick is a truly portable companion that easily fits in your backpack for on-the-go adventures, ensuring you never miss capturing those precious moments. Not only does it serve as a reliable selfie stick, but when the tripod legs are unfolded, it conveniently transforms into a desk phone holder or a standing phone holder. Keep it on your desk to elevate your video calls or use it on the floor for hands-free full-body shots. Experience versatility and capture amazing photos from unique angles with this multifunctional gadget.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Removable Remote Control With a control distance of up to 32 feet, our device allows you to effortlessly capture selfies with just a press of a button. What's more, you can easily transform the handle into a tripod, enabling you to take stunning group photos with your friends and family from a distance. All-in-one Compact Design 3 in 1 Selfie Stick with Tripod Easy Selfie Photography and Group Photos for Parties, Travel, Hiking, and More Quick and Convenient Tripod Function Included Widely Compatible Selfie Stick selfie stick is compatible with phone devices with width from 2.5 inches to 3.7 inches. Fits most iPhone or Android smartphones in the market.

Selfie Stick Tripod With its foldable tripod legs and extendable shaft, this selfie stick is a truly portable companion that easily fits in your backpack for on-the-go adventures, ensuring you never miss capturing those precious moments. Not only does it serve as a reliable selfie stick, but when the tripod legs are unfolded, it conveniently transforms into a desk phone holder or a standing phone holder. Keep it on your desk to elevate your video calls or use it on the floor for hands-free full-body shots. Experience versatility and capture amazing photos from unique angles with this multifunctional gadget. Characteristic Product size: 40 x 33 x 194 ~ 1010mm Gross weight: 170g; Net weight: 150g Wireless distance: 10M System: Android 4.4+, iOS 5.1+ Materials: ABS & Stainless steel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It’s durable, easy to use and extends nicely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Compact But Strong and Versatile!
reviews.reviewText: This SVISNA Phone Tripod Stand Selfie Stick is impressively engineered, compact and quickly adjusts to your desired configuration. In fact, it is so precisely fit together that you may not even be able to tell how to expand it, which essentially amounts to simply tugging on the neck, as there are no release buttons needing pressed, etc. The remote works via Bluetooth and let's you take your time to perfectly setup your shots, calmly position yourself and snap when you are ready.All said, there are many ways you'll likely find to make use of this stand/selfie stick combo and it should serve you well for many years to come!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the Versitality!
reviews.reviewText: This is so much more than a Selfie Stick!I love that it is also a compact tripod. My only wish is that it included a lightweight nylon case. I don't always need to carry a backpack, so a nylon case that slings over my shoulder would have been ideal.But that is a small 'wish' that does not affect my thoughts on the selfie stick itself.The wireless remote allows you to take the photo in your own time, not reliant on a phone timer.The adjustability makes taking photos from any and all angles a breeze.This is my first selfie stick. The old-school in your hand models just never appealed to me. The tripod model is a great idea, and I wish I would have thought of it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very stable; very cheap material.
reviews.reviewText: This tripod does it's job 'okay' at best. I don't know that it's worth the price tag.The material feels very cheap in the hand, and it won't stand up to much abuse. It's very light weight, but the folding tripod base seems far too thick to be used for a selfie stick. Then the swivel mount on top is very loose, and the weight of my phone is enough to make it move on it's own, even in the "locked" position. The same mount also allows my phone to tilt to the side under its own weight, which can only be momentarily adjusted before it starts to sink back again.I do like how compact it can get, given the max height, but with so little weight on the base, even a small phone makes it so top heavy when fully extended that it becomes pretty unstable.I don't know that I'd recommend this; maybe if it were on sale or if they lowered the price. There are far high quality options in this price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, compact, lightweight, and this selfie stick works exactly like you think it should
reviews.reviewText: What I discovered: You don't want to force it open, especially if you haven’t read the instructions. It seems like it is too tight or stuck at first but it is not. In reality this is put together to be compact which takes some design considerations and precision manufacturing. I like how compact and lightweight the stick is and found that it can fit in a men’s pants pocket or coat inner pocket without sticking out too far. Nothing is sharp or unfinished and it fits together well.To get started, gently separate the 3 legs and you'll notice that while you are doing so there is a sliding ring portion above the legs that needs to slide down on the center telescoping pole. Once the tripod is open, it's just a matter of extending the telescoping pole, which by the way reminds me of the radio antenna on my first car (67 Renault, what a dud), and of a heavy duty version of the old G-I Joe toy walkie-talkies of the day. Occasionally wipe the antenna clean and you're good to go. The phone clamps into place intuitively and securely.The little remote control sort-of looks like it might be an opening/closing lock button so it is easy to miss the first time you use the stick. It is about 1” x 2” x 3/8” with grey buttons and can be seen in a couple of the manufacturer’s provided photos. The remote is only removable when the legs are in place AND the adjustable phone clamp is tilted up (note the thumb screw), or when the pole is extended. Bluetooth pairing with my phone was super easy using the instructions and pushing the switch made my phone take a photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It kills multiple birds with one stone.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Makes a great tripod - at full extension it will stand over 5 feet tall. It uses a telescoping extension mechanism which gives you a ton of flexibility on choosing heights to record from.- Has a removable Bluetooth shutter button for snapping pics at a distance.- Has a locking mechanism for angling your phone frontwards/backwards.- Folds up to be pretty compact. It fits well in my disc golf bag beside my telescoping disc grabber.- The legs make this incredibly sturdy on solid / relatively level ground.Cons:- The grip for holding your phone really only works to hold it horizontally (which is the best way to record, anyway). This wouldn't be a problem normally, but phone designers like to put buttons for the phone on the sides, and it's almost impossible to attach your phone to this so that it doesn't hit the volume rocker/power button. If you attach the grip on the end of your phone away from the buttons, the grip will tilt to the side, as there is no locking mechanism for side-to-side. I wish they had used a magnetic attachment point for MagSafe phones instead, but it is what it is.4 stars because the phone grip is annoying. The rest of the tripod is awesome, though.
